title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: LMS-Based Microteaching for Mechanical Engineering Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently operate microteaching simulation modules via an LMS platform with over 90% proficiency
Learners apply three or more digital content creation techniques for solving mechanical engineering problems to real-world cases
Learners improve microteaching video materials based on peer feedback to achieve over 4.0/5.0 on the evaluation rubric
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
